Reviews.Title: It is great for the Money. Perfect Bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: Carla S
Reviews.Content: I did much research in finding a replacement TV for my bedroom.  This one had a few good things going for it, most important the price which was very good.  I will admit I am spoiled as my primary TV is a Samsung 1080p, which is awesome.Downsides: The picture on this TV is not perfect guess that is due to the 720p resolution. It is fine for the bedroom or secondary TV but I would not suggest for a main TV if you love to watch crisp and clear picture. Also this TV only contains 2 HDMI outputs just so you know one cable box and one Blue ray and that is it.Would recommend TV due to price point and Magnavox name.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, got it for my birthday
Reviews.Author: Daniel Lafollette
Reviews.Content: I was given this TV as a birthday present. It has a great picture, and the sound was surprisingly good. It was easy to hook up, and the controls and settings are very easy to use. It has 2 HDMI connections for future purchases, but for now I have my Wii, Old DVD player, and VCR hooked to the composite input via a switch box that I got from Radio Shack for $20. All in all I'm very pleased with it, it's a great value.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy this TV
Reviews.Author: Kathy Morgan
Reviews.Content: My husband purchased this for me for Christmas, it was bought back at the end of October but was not opened until Christmas, the TV only has maybe 10 hours max on it because it is in the bedroom. It cut off while watching it, it will not turn back on, the standby light is not on either, I called tech service they want me to pay for repairs since it was bought in October and it is now March.. I will never buy another Magnavox EVER !

Reviews.Title: details on the power supply problem
Reviews.Author: chris
Reviews.Content: Magnavox used faulty capacitors in the power supply.  That is why so many of these just die out of nowhere.  The faulty capacitors are made by a company called capxon.  My TV had 3 capacitors made by this company, 2 of them were bad (bad capacitors will have a rounded top and sometimes you can see fluid leaking from them).  If you know how to solder it is an easy and cheap fix to replace the bad caps.  About $5 in parts about 5 minutes worth of soldering and maybe 30 minutes more to take the TV apart and put it back together.  Of course make sure you buy a different brand of capacitor, as the capxon ones are complete garbage.

Reviews.Title: Decent TV
Reviews.Author: Keith Ferguson
Reviews.Content: The remote layout could be better and connections for cables (PC, DVD, etc.) are not the easiest to get to but overall a very good TV for the price.  I an not a video nut but to me the picture looks very nice.

Reviews.Title: TV will die, company will NOT back it.
Reviews.Author: Jen Z
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV 7 months ago and I liked it.  The picture was good, the sound quality was good.  Then yesterday I was watching TV and it went black.  The TV just DIED.  Black screen, no sound, no warning, either.  It will just not turn back on.  I called customer service and was informed that because it is 7 months past the purchase date, they will cover parts, but I will have to pay $70 for labor.  I spoke with a supervisor and with the warranty department and they agree.  I looked online and there have been multiple complaints about this exact same mechanism of disaster and the same response from Magnavox.  I will obviously strongly recommend against anyone buying this product and I will certainly avoid this company in general. If you buy this, I wish you better luck than I had.

Reviews.Title: Magnavox Model#32MF301B/F7
Reviews.Author: 808Marla
Reviews.Content: DO NOT BUY MAGNAVOX....1st TV bought broke within 1 week. Green & Blue haze. Returned & got a new one, now 8 months later & the power will not go on. Want $70 dollars to fix a manufacture defect. Customer service is horible. Called 10X. Been hung up on 2X while listing to their automated promps. Approx. hour & half in phone calls. Class action suit is in order!!!

Reviews.Title: TV dead on day 366!!!!  uggggggh!!!!
Reviews.Author: K. Powell "Kpow"
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these Magnovox LCD TVs. One has died 1 year to the day, actually day 366 from the purchase date. I called Funai (Magnovox) and they did offer to honor the one year 'limited' warranty. They pay for parts but no labor. Unwilling to send the 70 dollars for labor, I am stuck with a dust collecting black box. Magnovox will never get another red cent from me.

Reviews.Title: Serious flaw
Reviews.Author: J. Banville
Reviews.Content: This TV is a clone of the Sylvania LC320SS2. You can't adjust the backlight! It is at full brightness. This is fine if you're gonna watch in a really bright room, but even with the other picture controls, you cannot tame the light, so the "blacks" are really washed out in a dark or low lit room, such as your bedroom at night. Ruins the picture :(I had the $199 Haier 32" a week or so prior (unfortunately, my sample had a flickering picture, overblown whites and HMDI connector problems -read my review), BUT it still had a superior picture compared to this Sylvania, which has really bad pixelization when objects move around the screen.

Reviews.Title: Good for the money
Reviews.Author: Coach lover
Reviews.Content: I just purchased this tv and I am sorry to see the bad reviews. Mine has a great picture at the distance you are suppose to be away from the tv. Yes, if you sit too close to the tv, it is not very sharp but be where you are suppose to be, it has a beautiful picture. I am very happy with this purchase and paying under $200 was a bonus too.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY A MAGNAVOX
Reviews.Author: N. Tucker
Reviews.Content: Do not buy a Magnavox product they have not yet figured out how to conduct a quality assurance program to have a product last much longer than their 90 day warranty.  My TV stopped working in about 6 months, I barely used it as I was deployed the majority of the time. If your product breaks outside of 90 days and under 1 year there is a $70 dollar labor charge.  This is the first TV I have had break under 5 years.  Spend an extra $50 dollars and buy a major name brand.

Reviews.Title: magnavox 32 lcd junk
Reviews.Author: PATRICK SCHOTT
Reviews.Content: New tv, three hours use in second home. Power supply gone! Mailed in fixed, three hours use power supply out again.In second home so the time ran out, no warranty. This tv spent more time in the post office than it did in use at our vacation home. This is the price the US pays for third world country junk, slave labor. This tv was not cheap but the labor was I guarantee. Went throught this after WWII with NIPPON junk, now it's coming from who knows where. If you buy anything not made in the US, pay for the longest warranty you can get, you're going to need it.

Reviews.Title: $70.00 repair bill for warranty repair.
Reviews.Author: G. Hirt "Keep it simple"
Reviews.Content: This TV comes with a 90 day warranty - I purchased it 45 days ago and just recently tried to connect an external speaker - the speaker jack is dead. After 4 calls to excellent tech support which produced no help, I called warranty and was told the that repair cost would be $70.00... for a warranty repair!!!! If you buy this TV make sure to check every function as soon as you get it to be able to return it if it has a fault.

Reviews.Title: fight backt to a white collar fraud
Reviews.Author: kenp
Reviews.Content: I bought 60 magnavox tv model # 32mf301b/f7 lcd tv in september2012 after 3 months and till I am wrighting this today on 2/26/13 ten tv sets went totally dead and called magnavox customer service and got same response as others. i also mentioned about other consumer complaints and told them that it looks like bad cuircit designe or batch of cheap and bad or under rated components on their power board and they should refund the money or replace the tv with better or reliable tv.they do not give a damn about it. I think we all should file the complaint with consumer protection agency. this is a scam to collect money by repairing tv again and again. Also make a note that emreson 32 inch lcd is a clone tv of magnvox tv and uses same power board and same problems.I am filing a complaint to consumer protection agency. those who has same complaint, please send an e mail to me on bwkenpatel@hotmail.comThanks

Reviews.Title: DO NOT PURCHASE!!!
Reviews.Author: Love to Read in MN
Reviews.Content: Did not purchase this TV from Amazon, but thought I would add my 2 cents - TV is junk, used in bedroom for most of year (used the sleep timer so barely any hours on it), brought to cabin for summer months (used even less :-)...), last week 12/4/2013 (purchased Aug 2012), TV just died - same issue as other reviewers, wish I would have checked here before buying - stay away from this TV!!!

Reviews.Title: Update from my previous review.
Reviews.Author: ginya
Reviews.Content: The Company granted me a $15 refund for the misunderstanding of the original tv I chose not being available and I was sent a different one.  I still have to say that this product is a big wobbly at the base and has no table top mounting features.  The remote also does not work very well.With that said I have AT&T; installing Uverse TV which will provide me with a dvr, better channels and a proper remote.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money
Reviews.Author: KERRY M PAWLING
Reviews.Content: This TV is well worth the money.  I've bought Magnavox products for years and I have never been let down.  It should be worth a try as long as it's priced below $250.

Reviews.Title: More of the same
Reviews.Author: ce1011
Reviews.Content: I received this TV as a gift so I didn't look up any reviews on the product until now, 11 months after receiving it, when the power light went off and the TV would not turn back on. I was very happy with the TV until this happened and after contacting customer service, as many before me, I was told that since it was out of the 3 month warranty period, I would need to pay $70 for labor to have it fixed. The representative acted as if I was the first person to detail this problem and even had the audacity to ask me if I had "tried a different wall outlet". I was pretty candid with her about all the reviews I had read and overwhelming negative feedback on this product. She said she would speak to her superior and request a call back for me but I doubt I will hear anything again. The obvious lack of responsibility the company has taken for this defective product is disgraceful.

Reviews.Title: Piece of _____
Reviews.Author: Craig Doyle
Reviews.Content: Had the TV for 7 months and it worked perfectly.  We were very happy... And then it died.  Apparently, this is rampant in this model. Beware.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY MAGNAVOX
Reviews.Author: Leanne S Praw
Reviews.Content: Had the TV for 7 months, like another reviewer the TV just went out, they want to charge me $70 Labor to fix the thing, obviously some bad quality, spend a little more and get a better brand that stands behind their products.

Reviews.Title: Piece of junk
Reviews.Author: cheryljoan
Reviews.Content: I had not read reviews, and had just purchased because my mother-in-law needed a reasonably prices TV.  She has barely even watched the thing, and now it will not power on.  After reading the reviews of others, apparently this is a common problem.  This was basically like throwing money in the trash can.  I don't know if it is worth getting fixed, especially if something else is statistically going to go wrong with it.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY!
Reviews.Author: Margaret
Reviews.Content: Poorly made TV.  Bought quite a few of these because the price was good and I thought Magnavox was a good, reliable company.  Not so.  So far I have had one of the remote sensors fall out of one tv, and two just went dead in the middle of watching.  WILL NEVER BUY MAGNAVOX AGAIN.  Warranty support is non-existent with this company.

Reviews.Title: Power supply issue
Reviews.Author: Darrell Hanecki
Reviews.Content: This TV failed after about 10 hours of use.  It appears to be the same problem identified in multiple reviews, basically the TV dies, no power, no picture. It becomes a brick. The customer service people are useless.  Save your money. I'll not buy another Magnavox...unless I need a door stop.  I'd give this TV zero stars if I could.

Reviews.Title: Wow, big mistake
Reviews.Author: Jacob E Crawford
Reviews.Content: I feel a bit silly after reading through these reviews on this tv.  Bought it in haste without doing some research and have had the same problem as many others...power supply dead after only several months of minimal use.  Standby light out and the tv unresponsive.  Since others have had this problem after fixing it once, we're obviously not paying the service fees to make it right.  Too bad Magnavox is not a better company and recognize this is a defective part.  Either way, no more Magnavox for us.

Reviews.Title: junk,junk,junk
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these in August. One died the first week of Jan.(shut off and will not power on). The other one died this morning, it also shut off and will not power back up.Called customer service on the first on, paid the seventy dollars and waited three weeks for the box, guess I will do the same with this one.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: gnoshme "K"
Reviews.Content: A great little TV.  Lighter than you would expect and picture quality is great.  Impressed with the input options, specifically that it's smart enough to work when you are mixing and matching picture and audio inputs.  One of the two HDMI inputs can be used for picture only, and the audio is accepted through the phono plugs. That means if you have an older computer with HDMI output that doesn't include sound, you are still good to go.The only negative issue I've had is that with a UBUNTU box, the HDMI connection doesn't "just work".  The computer is sensing the wrong resolution. Not sure what end that issue is on though.

Reviews.Title: Power Out - BAD BUY!
Reviews.Author: BTR
Reviews.Content: This TV was purchased sometime after July of 2011, as the manufacture date is July 2011. It worked fine up until today (1/18/13), when it all of a sudden just stopped - power gone! No standby light, won't turn on. Seems like a common problem for this TV based on other reviews. I've got old, bulky box, heavy TVs that have lasted over ten years, why these don't work after 1.5 years, I'll never understand! Shame on you Magnavox (Funai) - I will NEVER purchase another one from your company.

Reviews.Title: Do not Buy
Reviews.Author: short fuse
Reviews.Content: After nine months of very little use the power did not turn on.  Magnavox would not honor warranty for parts even though the problem is common as is apparent when doing the research online.  Will not be buying Magnavox, Philips or any other electronic product of the Funai Corporation.

Reviews.Title: Great choice
Reviews.Author: Rzrhog
Reviews.Content: My tv fits great in my room.  The volume bar seems to be rather high when I watch it, but I can hear it and it has great quality.  I am not regretting this purchase at all!

Reviews.Title: Lasted a yr and a half
Reviews.Author: melissa
Reviews.Content: We bought this at Sams for a bedroom.  It jasn't been watched a lot and now after a yr and a half the right side of the screen has lines all down it and the left side is still perfect. At times the picture wil come full screen.  No idea what is wrong but it's out of warranty and it doesn;t look like they back their product,  neither does Toshiba.  I had a Sony for  3 yrs(out of warranty) that had a problem and they only charged me $130 to replace it with a new 46.  I was very happy.This tv was  nice for a bedroom while it worked.

Reviews.Title: Junk!
Reviews.Author: Charles Pecevich
Reviews.Content: TV power supply died after about 1 year of limited use as a second TV in a bedroom. Spend a little more $ and buy a more reputable brand than Magnavox.

Reviews.Title: Does the Job
Reviews.Author: J. Cummings "JojoFlower"
Reviews.Content: I have had this tv for over a year and a half. It is my secondary tv in my bedroom and I leave it on all night as I sleep.The picture is pretty good on it. Not as nice as my LG in my living room but also &1500 cheaper than that one was.The sound is fine for a bedroom tv. I have a fios box and bluray hooked up to it and have never had a problem with it.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Charles P. Webster
Reviews.Content: Got a good deal on this at Walmart.  Purchased for a seasonal condo.  Used it for about 10 hours and then didn't turn it on for 7 months.  3 more hours and it just shut off.  Had the TV but no receipt.  Checked on reviews and they said power supply.  Finally got the TV back home where I took it to a qualified repair facility who told me for $40 that the power supply was gone and it would cost upwards of $160 for the repair.  Junk/Junk/Junk.  Black Friday deal at Walmart has a 32" Vizio for $98!  Going to use this TV to experiment with my solder iron.

Reviews.Title: Looks nice, poor construction and QC.
Reviews.Author: Geezer 67
Reviews.Content: One of my kids gave me one of these about a year ago.  It looked great and worked well until a few day's ago.  Exactly six day's short of a year the picture went out.  if I turn it off for awhile sometimes the picture will come back for a few minutes after it's turned back on.  I have experience in electronics, and it looks like a bad solder joint to me.  I called to see if it could be repaired or replaced under the warranty, and was told that they would pay for shipping, and parts (if any), and I would have to pay for the labor time!  I know the labor time would come to at least $100.00, and the set only cost twice that then and now, so I said forget it, I'll repair it myself or buy a new different TV.  A year of decent TV for $200.00 isn't that bad, but it should have lasted at least five years.  My advise is to stay away from Magnavox, and I mean all of their products.  You would be better off with a no name manufacturer that you haven't heard of before.  That's my two cents worth....

Reviews.Title: Magnavox 37MF301B/F7
Reviews.Author: Cinda-Rella
Reviews.Content: What a piece of junk! Stay away from Magnavox! My TV is a little over a year old and it continually was turning itself off. Then it finally died altogether. Beware!

Reviews.Title: Great Price
Reviews.Author: Freddy Fenkell
Reviews.Content: The tv was Cheap and it works without any issues. I have 3 of these and they are all use as computer monitors for watching movies and over the air broadcast.

Reviews.Title: Junk Junk Junk
Reviews.Author: Mary Anne Maples
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV at Sears about 18 months ago.  One day it just wouldn't turn on anymore.  The TV was manufactured 19 months ago.  When calling customer support for Magnavox (note - also Sylvania and Funai), I was told "oh you got the 1 in 450,000 bad TVs.  By the sound of the other reviews I don't think mine was an anomaly.  I was then given the phone number of a service center where I could PAY to have the TV fixed.  The authorized service center is 118 miles from my home and maybe they could, maybe they couldn't fix it.Just replaced it with a Samsung!

Reviews.Title: works well as a large door stop
Reviews.Author: kking
Reviews.Content: This TV was given to my as a gift and it barely lasted a year. Just shut off one morning and never came back on. Recent reviews that I've seen report that this model has faulty capacitors.Company offered to fix it for 110.I will never purchase a Magnavox or Emerson product again, or anything manufactured by Funai Corporation.

Reviews.Title: Broke after 1.5 years
Reviews.Author: Jeremiah
Reviews.Content: After 1.5 years the TV randomly turned off during the middle of an episode of The Office and we could not get it to turn back on. I would not recommend this product!Note: We took the TV to a repair shop and so far the repair bill is $130 and counting.

Reviews.Title: Should have read reviews before buying!
Reviews.Author: BornAgainNewYorker
Reviews.Content: After 9 months, I too got the "black screen of death!" Called customer service and got the same song & dance about paying $70 for them to repair it OR take it 45 miles to the repair shop and pay them whatever labor they might charge. I agree with all the other reviewers and will never have another Japanese made Magnavox in my house! I hope other people check the reviews before they have to deal with customer no service!

Reviews.Title: buy a samsug
Reviews.Author: wacoBrian
Reviews.Content: Do not buy this model of magnavox tv. Odds are it will not last a year.shop around and do your research. Im sure that other magnavox models will be made better quality.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for the price
Reviews.Author: John Mooney
Reviews.Content: Was looking for an inexpensive but quality 32 inch flat screen for the office. After a few months of use, I can say its been perfect. No problems, excellent TV for the money

Reviews.Title: Dead TV
Reviews.Author: Yao
Reviews.Content: I purchased the TV about one year ago. It died last week. showed a black screen, no power.  Will never buy any Magnavox product again.

Reviews.Title: Just died...black screen. DO NOT BUY!
Reviews.Author: J.
Reviews.Content: Terrible, Terrible TV. The quality was good while it last...which was a whole 14 months. Went to turn it on last night and it just wouldn't. No warnings, no blinking lights. It is just dead. I called the warranty department and it is past the 1 year warranty. They said I can send it in and they will replace it for $110. What a terrible rip off!

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: LATOYA MILLINGTON
Reviews.Content: I brought it for my son's room and it is perfect for him, he is in love with the surround sound feature. Down side is that you can't really hood to many devices up its only HDMI the Wii U can hook to it but the old version can't. Hence the reason I gave it a four. Note that you should look into the extra warranty because the one it comes with is parts not labor.

Reviews.Title: Stay away
Reviews.Author: Potatoe
Reviews.Content: This tv is cheap and bad. Image is average at best. No headphone jack for cpu speakers. Stock speakers crappy. Worst thing is there is no way to dim backlight. Physically hurts to watch in dark room. USB worked good though and easy to view pics. I sold this and got a Sony that is waaaaayy better.Look else where

Reviews.Title: Good TV for bedroom!
Reviews.Author: MJK.Mark
Reviews.Content: Perfect size for your bedroom. For your living/family room, this MIGHT  be too small. But, good quality picture and sound

Reviews.Title: Great value for the price
Reviews.Author: Little Achiever
Reviews.Content: Decent picture, sound is a bit weak but that seems to be common among this product class.Loses a star because stand and the stand install is low quality. Screws did not fit properly.

Reviews.Title: Good 7200p tv
Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: I have has this a year now with no issues. Picture is good and the sound is fine. I would also rate it high for ease of use. Been good for me.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy Magnavox products.
Reviews.Author: Countzerro
Reviews.Content: After 90 days, you have to bring the TV to an authorized repair center, and pay for labor. Very unhelpful customer support.

Reviews.Title: TV died after 8 month of use
Reviews.Author: Neil V
Reviews.Content: TV was fine until it died after less than 8 months. Thought I had 1 yr warranty but found out when I called Magnavox service that warranty is only 90 days labor and 1 year parts, so now I have to pay them $70 to fix my 8 month old television.

Reviews.Title: Mag 32 - inch LCD TV
Reviews.Author: bmoorim
Reviews.Content: Found delivery was quick, but, box did not containRemote or User Manuel or any other accessories. Amazon was great in refunding $40.00 immediately to purchase a remote. Set works beautifully! Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Still Waiting
Reviews.Author: gerilyn melzar
Reviews.Content: Bought for my sister who is in rehab.  Have not had a chance to set it up yet, she is still influx.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the money!
Reviews.Author: vb
Reviews.Content: Piece of crap!  Power supply went out after 1 year.  TV was hardly used as it was in a vacation home.  Never buy a Magnavox again.

Reviews.Title: Review of the reviews
Reviews.Author: Big D
Reviews.Content: Don't know much about the flat screen tvs but am looking and certainly appreciate the customer reviews. It's a big shopping help. So far I have learned to avoid the name "Magnavox." Way too many of the same common complaints. Also, customer service is a big item.If you fail there, You Fail, period! To think that once upon a time they had a good name. Thank you consumers.  Big D

Reviews.Title: Now I'm worried...
Reviews.Author: MovieFan
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV when my $500 Sharp suddenly stopped working the week before the Super Bowl and I wasn't going to be able to take it in for repairs right away.  It was a good price and I actually think the picture is better than the Sharp...I use an antenna and it's been fine.  The Sharp was just over four years old and I was mad that it happened right after the extended warranty ran out.  Now I'm worried because the descriptions in the bad reviews sound exactly like what happened to my other TV, but sooner.  I've only had this one for three months and haven't had any problems with it.  The only reason I wouldn't give it five stars is that the remote doesn't have as many features as the Sharp (I was spoiled), plus there is a tiny delay when I change channels.  Otherwise, I like it just fine for now and will cross my fingers that it lasts longer than it did for other people.  I have it hooked up to rabbit ears through a DVD/VCR player/recorder in the HDMI slot and the picture really is okay.Is the fade to black issue something that happens to HDTVs in general?  I find is strange that the same thing happened to two different brands at two different price points.

Reviews.Title: Won't Turn Back On
Reviews.Author: P Stephen Devereaux
Reviews.Content: I tried to plug it into surge protect, now it won't turn on.  The repair costs more than the damn TV!!! I will never buy a magnavox EVER!!!

Reviews.Title: JUNK
Reviews.Author: tony
Reviews.Content: I got less that 50 hours on this TV. The power now longer turns on. I call for service they had no problem charging my credit card $70 to repair it. three weeks later still waiting for a box from the company to send it back. O coworker bought the same TV and it also broke. He got his money back from Cosco and was told that this set is JUNK!!! SAVE YOUR MONEY! CUSTOMER SUPPORT SUCKS SUCKS SUCKS!

Reviews.Title: Average TV with one downside for my application
Reviews.Author: Ronald J. Rossman Jr.
Reviews.Content: We purchased this TV for our sons room. It's being fed audio and video from our Sony STR-DA3600ES receiver. While everything works when zone 2 of the receiver is set to use the audio/video feeds from the Wii, when zone 2 is set to shoutcast that's built into the receiver I was unable to hear anything. After experimenting with the zone set to the Wii, I discovered if there's no video signal in to the TV via the RCA connections, the audio input is ignored/muted. This is a huge pain in the butt for me and don't have a clue why the TV is setup to do this. So now to get the setup to work as I want, I have to move our Sony TV that's currently in our bedroom into his room and use this TV in our bedroom.Had I known the TV behaved his way, I would have opted for a different unit. I know many people won't run into this issue, but I can't say I've had a TV before that behaved in this fashion

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: JoyceLynn
Reviews.Content: Love it, a great buy.  Just wish that UPS - the shipper, hadn't left the package in full view on my front porch in the rain when ther were 2 unlocked cars in the driveway AND the cleaning lady was IN THE HOUSE!

Reviews.Author: Cyndi Garrison
Reviews.Content: The TV was damaged during shipping.Was very impressed by Amazon return.  VERY EASY with now questions.  Thank you so much for the help.

ProductInfo.Features:
Clear Pix Engine Plus
Adaptive 3D Y/C Comb Filter
Speaker Output Power 5 Watts per channel
PC-Input,Trilingual On Screen Display (English / Spanish / French)
Trilingual On Screen Display (English / Spanish / French)
ProductInfo.Name: Magnavox 32MF301B/F7 32-Inch 720p LCD HDTV
